amendment.description: Amendment prevents the Federal Government from reinterpreting a State's laws or regulations to require credit-hour programs to convert back to clock-hour programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-404 to repeal a section of the credit hour regulation impacting clock hour programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Foxx.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
